name: The Sound Of The Wind: Definitive Edition
name_original: The Sound Of The Wind: Definitive Edition
description:
[EN]

12 months ago something happened, causing Alex to lose her memory. The only thing she remembers is that Anders disappeared.

Alex thinks she has found her friend.  But the blurred memories will gradually return.

- FEATURES-

1. The game has two endings: The good and the bad one. It will depend on how much you have explored the environments of 'The Sound Of The Wind'.

2. Achievements: Every action can lead to an in game achievement.

3. Epic soundtack

**Internet Conection may be required for  a cinematic **

[ES]

12 meses atrás algo sucedió, lo que provocó que Alex perdiera la memoria. Lo único que recuerda es que Andrés desapareció.

Alex cree que ha encontrado a su amigo. Pero sus demonios poco a poco la atormentarán.

-FEATURES-

1. El juego cuenta con dos finales: El bueno y el malo. Dependerá de que tanto has explorado los entornos de 'The Sound Of The Wind'.

2. Logros: Cada acción puede otorgarte un logro, que podrás ver en el menú principal.

3. Soundtrack espectacular.

**Es posible que se requiera de una conexión a internet para el streaming de una cinematica**

- SYSTEM  REQUIREMENTS / REQUISITOS DEL SISTEMA -

MINIMUM: [Ultra Low]

OS: Windows 10

Processor: Intel Celeron J3060

Memory: 4GB RAM

Recommended: [Very High]

OS: Windows 10

Processor: Intel Core i5 10300F

Memory: 8GB RAM

Graphics: GTX 970 / AMD Raedon R9 390

Definitive edition includes all patches from original version
